any additional information: Monitoring of the reduction over time showed a distinct color change.
TLC showed that all three strains had similar banding patterns.
Dyes included crystal violet + basic fuchsin + brilliant green + malachite green.
In comparison to freely suspended cells, immobilized cells had lower decolorization rates.
Strain combinations led to the rapid mineralization of combined triphenylmethane dyes.
Dye removal from the media was observed without retention on the cell wall.
